last_episode_to_air.name: Getting To I Do
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kenny and Angelique receive some unlikely help with their wedding planning; things get out of hand.

name: In the Cut
overview: A well-renowned barber meets the son he never knew he had, thirty years after his birth. Work, love and life collide as they adjust to life as a new family.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Longtime barber Jay Weaver is in for the surprise of his life when Kenny Clark shows up. Kenny is the son Jay never knew he had.

episodes.name: Life Cut Short
episodes.overview: After Jay's best friend, Smitty, suffers a minor fall, Jay decides it's time for his own doctor's check-up, but a misunderstanding turns a simple appointment into something else entirely.

episodes.name: Gold Diggers for Dummies
episodes.overview: Kenny thinks Jay's new girlfriend is taking advantage of him; Smitty gets caught up in a dominoes tournament with an old rival.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: Kenny's past comes back to haunt him; Smitty starts dating Jay's ex, but then finds out she used to date Jay.

episodes.name: The Ball's in Your Court
episodes.overview: When Kenny's ex-wife comes back into the picture, it's learned that Kenny is technically not yet divorced and still has feelings for his ex.

episodes.name: The Beat Goes On
episodes.overview: Jay receives a letter from his ex-wife Nadine stating that she has deserted her beauty salon and eloped with a wealthy gentleman.

episodes.name: All Good in the Hood
episodes.overview: Everyone gets competitive when the barbershop, the beauty salon, and Mabel's Tables all get nominated for an award.

episodes.name: One Night Only
episodes.overview: Jay and Smitty entertain to ladies for the night. Smitty allows Kenny to stay at his place to study.

episodes.name: Beverly's Back
episodes.overview: Kenny's mother, Beverly, comes to town for a visit.

episodes.name: Very Superstitious
episodes.overview: A strange man convinces Jay and Smitty that the barbershop is cursed.

episodes.name: Easy Come, Easy Go
episodes.overview: Smitty gets a new smartphone and begins online dating. Jay receives more than he planned when he makes a withdrawal from the bank.

episodes.name: Groundhog Jay
episodes.overview: For some strange reason, Jay has been reliving the same day over and over again.

episodes.name: Love Sick
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl have a one night stand.

episodes.name: Keep It Real
episodes.overview: Jay agrees to have a reality television producer film around the place.

episodes.name: Best Foot Forward
episodes.overview: Kenny starts dating his professor, who has terrible feet.

episodes.name: Blood Pressure Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Mable forces healthy food on her soul food eating clientele. Kenny plans a reunion for Jay and his estranged sister, Thelma.

episodes.name: Jailbreak
episodes.overview: Jay gets arrested due to some unpaid parking tickets he had in the past. Kenny's phone is stolen.

episodes.name: Stellaaaaa
episodes.overview: Kenny falls in love with Smitty's stunning daughter, Stella; Jay and Cheryl get offers to sell their shops.

episodes.name: Whose Is It
episodes.overview: Jay finds a positive pregnancy test.

episodes.name: In The Doghouse
episodes.overview: The guys find themselves in hot water after reacting to a pregnancy scare.

episodes.name: Matter Of Principle
episodes.overview: Jay's old friend, Roderick, drops by the barbershop, bringing back old memories and old grudges; Smitty's at odds with his new landlord.

episodes.name: Sharing Is Caring
episodes.overview: The couples trust is tested when they share too much on social media but refuse to share their passwords.

episodes.name: Blast From The Past
episodes.overview: Jay hires an efficiency expert to improve the business; Smitty sees fire when Mable's old flame, Charles, reappears.

episodes.name: The Jay Foundation
episodes.overview: When the IRS comes knockin', Jay solicits his friends for help.

episodes.name: Switcheroo
episodes.overview: Smitty and Mable switch jobs in a competition to prove who is the more skilled worker; Kenny and Stella make a big relationship decision.

episodes.name: The Hustle
episodes.overview: Kenny's music career is taking off, and Jay wants a piece of the action; Sherlock Smitty is on the case when Jay's new ATM machine goes missing from the barbershop.

episodes.name: Petty Things
episodes.overview: Jay and Smitty see dollar signs when an enthusiastic lawyer convinces them their complaints can result in big cash settlements; Kenny reconnects with Angelique, but it's her new boyfriend, Conrad, that is interested in a relationship with Kenny.

episodes.name: The Relationship Game
episodes.overview: Mable introduces a relationship game show to the restaurant to attract new business, the couples compete but their partnerships are put to the test.

episodes.name: ExtravHAIRganza
episodes.overview: Cheryl has her eyes on the grand prize at the big hair show, but her ambition is contagious and soon Jay and Smitty are competing against her.

episodes.name: Book. Club. Love
episodes.overview: The ladies and Percy are completely absorbed in their new book club, but the guys soon discover that their real-life secrets are the true topic of discussion.

episodes.name: Feng Shui
episodes.overview: Cheryl and Percy have a design disagreement, driving The Percy Experience to the barbershop; Smitty is convinced that he is the target of a parking ticket conspiracy.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Jay is ready to take things to the next level with Cheryl but there is one problem, Kenny can't take the hint that it is time to move out.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: Jay battles with an unanswered proposal from Cheryl; Smitty sabotages Kenny's chances of finding an apartment.

episodes.name: Mind Your Business
episodes.overview: Jay compromises Percy's new relationship; Smitty goes over the top when he believes he has shingles.

episodes.name: There's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Cheryl's ex-husband comes into town, testing Jay and Cheryl's relationship; Kenny gives Smitty his spare key for safety but soon regrets it.

episodes.name: Looking Sharp
episodes.overview: Cheryl puts herself and Jay on a diet to get wedding-ready; Smitty receives a head injury that leaves him with a genius IQ.

episodes.name: The Ring Bearer
episodes.overview: Cheryl misplaces her wedding ring; Kenny inadvertently gets caught up in a love triangle.

episodes.name: Don't Knock the Hustle
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl reluctantly agree to hire Percy as their wedding planner; Smitty is hustled into buying a broken television and seeks vengeance.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Jay's sister, Thelma, airs out the guys' secrets; Smitty is acting stranger than usual.

episodes.name: Checkin' In, Dozin' Off
episodes.overview: Kenny fails to check in with Angelique, leading to some tough love; Smitty struggles with insomnia.

episodes.name: Fed Up
episodes.overview: Cheryl moves into Jay's condominium and does some redecorating; Kenny witnesses a car break-in and doesn't know if he should snitch.

episodes.name: The Life Saver
episodes.overview: Jay feels indebted to Smitty after he saves Jay's life; Kenny believes that Angelique is hinting at wanting another baby.

episodes.name: May the Best Man Win
episodes.overview: Kenny and Smitty compete over who should be Jay's best man for the wedding; Angelique starts working at Mabel's to earn some extra money.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Both Jay and Cheryl are pressured into having bachelor/bachelorette parties, and it does not end well.

episodes.name: The Big Day
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl try to overcome the obstacle of their wedding venue being double-booked; Mabel is offered a lot of money to sell her restaurant.

episodes.name: The Honeymooners
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl's honeymoon phase is short lived when Cheryl empties out her storage unit into their condominium; Kenny and Smitty become roommates for the weekend.

episodes.name: Monster in Law
episodes.overview: Jay meets Cheryl's mother for the first time; Kenny reunites with an old friend who goes from houseguest to burden.

episodes.name: Poker Face
episodes.overview: Jay, Smitty and Kenny try to win back their valuables after losing in a poker game; Kenny has to adjust to Angelique's newfound fame when she becomes an internet celebrity.

episodes.name: Too Sexy for My Sweats
episodes.overview: Jay struggles with accepting Cheryl's taste in bedtime attire; Percy gains a celebrity client, affecting his normal hours in the salon.

episodes.name: Dating Soulmates
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl meet the perfect couple with whom to double date, until they learn about their criminal pasts; Percy gives Smitty a makeover while he goes through a mid-life crisis.

episodes.name: Used to Be My Homie
episodes.overview: Jay feels out of the loop when Smitty's old friend comes to town; Kenny becomes jealous of Angelique's male friend.

episodes.name: Lucky Charmed
episodes.overview: Jay buys Cheryl a necklace for her birthday, not knowing it was stolen; when the police want it back, Jay must devise a plan to return it before she finds out.

episodes.name: Raging Bully
episodes.overview: Jay's sister visits with a new beau, who used to bully Jay; Smitty's barber's licence expires, leaving him in jeopardy of losing it without Kenny's help.

episodes.name: Cyrano de Kenny
episodes.overview: Jay tries to mend Kenny's relationship with Angelique by texting on his behalf, which makes things worse; a new fusion food truck is stealing all of Mabel's loyal customers.

episodes.name: Slumdog Millionaire
episodes.overview: When a scam artist slips and falls in the shop, Jay defends himself in court; Kenny and Smitty's plan to fix things in their building backfires.

episodes.name: America's Got Skillz, Part 1
episodes.overview: Kenny, Smitty and Percy audition for a talent show competition with Jay as Percy's manager; Mabel begins to lose customers when a famous food blogger writes a bad review.

episodes.name: America's Got Skillz, Part 2
episodes.overview: Smitty moves on to the next round and turns on Jay and Kenny; Cheryl's girls' night takes a turn after two of the women find out they're dating the same man.

episodes.name: The Cold Shoulder
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl's petty fight over a remote leads to a bigger problem. Smitty tries driving for Goober using Kenny's car, but his ratings aren't the best.

episodes.name: Barbershop Through the Years
episodes.overview: When the city announces it will demolish Jay's business to make way for a new freeway, everyone must come together to convince an appraiser that the barbershop is a historical landmark.

episodes.name: The Ole Bait and Switch
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl struggle to keep their place clean, so they hire a maid, which turns into a fiasco; Angelique accuses Kenny of cheating and goes to extreme measures to prove her suspicions.

episodes.name: Colonoscareapy
episodes.overview: Jay conspires with his doctor on an elaborate scheme to convince Smitty he needs a colonoscopy; Mabel's birthday celebration takes an interesting a turn when two of her ex-boyfriends show up.

episodes.name: Jokes on You
episodes.overview: Cheryl and a reluctant Jay decide to seek marriage counselling to help with their communication issues; Smitty starts dating a stand-up comic and becomes part of her act.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Trending
episodes.overview: Jay hires a temporary barber who becomes a big hit with customers; Mabel's new sandwich draws massive crowds and her supply can't keep up with the demand.

episodes.name: New Management
episodes.overview: Smitty tries to take advantage of Kenny when he becomes superintendent of their apartment building; with business booming, Mabel brings a new server on board at the restaurant, while a customer tries to cause trouble.

episodes.name: Sister Sister
episodes.overview: Jay is shadowed by an over-the-top method actor preparing for his next role as a barber and gets too close for comfort; Mabel's bourgeois sister, Ruby, visits and she must deal with their stark differences.

episodes.name: Broken Bones
episodes.overview: Jay teaches Kenny how to play dominoes in preparation for a tournament; Smitty's gambling debt gets him in trouble with an unlikely loan shark.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: A female friend from Percy's past believes he is the father of her child; Smitty wins big at the racetrack and holds a "Smitty Tank" competition to invest his winnings.

episodes.name: The Takeover
episodes.overview: When the salon and Mabel's Tables are both short-staffed, the guys take over the restaurant while Percy hires a social influencer to assist at the salon.

episodes.name: Just Friends
episodes.overview: Jay and Melissa start spending more time together, which does not sit well with Cheryl; Kenny becomes an instant celebrity after cutting the hair of a professional basketball star.

episodes.name: Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Jay has a new secret admirer that he tries to hide from Cheryl; Kenny and Angelique struggle to move forward when they have trouble letting go of things from their past.

episodes.name: Priors & Engagements
episodes.overview: Kenny plans to propose to Angelique, but her recent actions have him second guessing; when Mabel is approached by the local newspaper for a front-page feature, things go awry when they dig into her past.

episodes.name: Pros & Cons
episodes.overview: Jay looks for a replacement to run Mable's Tables and discovers his ex-convict brother-in-law is moving in at home; Kenny is dismayed by Angelique's antique doll collection.

episodes.name: Tooth Treason
episodes.overview: Jay undergoes dental surgery and milks his recovery for longer than necessary; meanwhile, Mable's Tables new manager Trish Devoe has a new plan to grow business for the restaurant.

episodes.name: Not In Kansas Anymore
episodes.overview: An old friend of Jay's resurfaces while, Percy struggles in revealing a secret he has kept from his parents.

episodes.name: Rock Le Cradle
episodes.overview: Kenny's famous favorite aunt visits with her new boyfriend; meanwhile, Wade lists his apartment on a vacation rental property site.

episodes.name: Cooking That Kitchen
episodes.overview: Cheryl starts an in-home salon; at Mable's Tables, Trish, desperate for a chef, teaches Karen how to cook.

episodes.name: Big Bruh
episodes.overview: Kenny joins an outreach programme called Big Bruh, while Jay and Wade deal with a biker crew.

episodes.name: Rollin' Stone
episodes.overview: Jay discovers he has a long-lost brother. Meanwhile, Kenny seeks refuge from Angelique.

episodes.name: If You Wanna Make An Omelette
episodes.overview: Jay, in preparation of becoming a first-time grandfather, tags along with Kenny and Angelique for their parenting class. Meanwhile, Wade must choose between love or money.

episodes.name: Game Fight Night
episodes.overview: Jay and Cheryl host a heated game night; Trish throws a Paint & Sip at the restaurant.

episodes.name: The Big Reveal
episodes.overview: A rat runs the guys out of the shop and into Cheryl's salon; Kenny and Angelique throw a gender-reveal party.

episodes.name: Vasect-Oh My!
episodes.overview: Kenny considers having a vasectomy; Cheryl and Jay embark on a fitness journey.

episodes.name: Pappa Jay
episodes.overview: Jay panics about becoming a grandfather and makes some irrational decisions; Kenny is blindsided by a friend's secret.

episodes.name: Getting To I Do
episodes.overview: Kenny and Angelique receive some unlikely help with their wedding planning; things get out of hand.
